title: Google\Cloud\AccessApproval\V1\UpdateAccessApprovalSettingsMessage
name: UpdateAccessApprovalSettingsMessage
description:
Request to update access approval settings.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.accessapproval.v1.UpdateAccessApprovalSettingsMessage

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: The update mask applies to the settings. Only the top level fields of AccessApprovalSettings (notification_emails & enrolled_services) are supported. For each field, if it is included, the currently stored value will be entirely overwritten with the value of the field passed in this request. For the FieldMask definition, see https://developers.google.com/protocol-buffers/docs/reference/google.protobuf#fieldmask If this field is left unset, only the notification_emails field will be updated.
